text: Nachertay zhe dlya nas prekrasnuyu zhizn' v etom mire i budushchem, ibo my obratilis' k tebe s raskayaniyem". Allakh otvetstvoval: "YA porazhayu Svoim nakazaniyem togo, kogo zakhochu, a Moya milost' rasprostranyayetsya na vse sushcheye. I posemu YA predopredelyu milost' bogoboyaznennym i tem, kotoryye razdayut zakat, veruyut v Nashi znameniya
